thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com | 2 of 530
thread.title: Gabriela

author: Gabriela
title: Gabriela
text: Opticontacts is great! I started buying from them 2 years ago and I have not been disappointed. My most recent purchase was delayed because they did not have my contacts in stock. I was immediately informed of the delay and was given information about when I should receive my contacts. It took about a week and a half for them to ship my contacts and I received them within four days! I would definitely recommend!
